instructions.overview: This JSON file contains a list of Facebook groups to import into the Groups Posting system.
required_fields: name - The name of the Facebook group
url - The full URL to the Facebook group

optional_fields.memberCount: Number of members in the group (integer)
optional_fields.accountId: Specific account ID to assign this group to

notes: Groups with duplicate names or URLs will be skipped
If 'accountId' is not specified, groups will be unassigned
Language codes should follow ISO 639-1 standards
Member count helps with group prioritization

import_notes: File should contain ONLY the array of group objects
Copy the 'sample_groups' array content for your actual import file
Remove any JSON formatting markers like 'sample_groups': [...] wrapper
Ensure all URLs are valid Facebook group URLs
